relevant_findings.skeleton: Focal decalcification of wrist bones and small periarticular cysts and erosions of finger phalanges without decreased total bone mineral density (1.008 g/cm2; Z score -0.07)
relevant_findings.ultrasound: Hypoechogenic structure 5 mm in diameter behind the inferior pole of the left thyroid gland

changes_over_time.surgical_outcome: Normocalcemia obtained post-surgery, but serum calcium returned to elevated levels two weeks later
changes_over_time.diagnosis_change: Initially diagnosed with primary hyperparathyroidism, later diagnosed with benign hypocalciuric hypercalcemia after further assessment
